column4: Dear god. I've got such an annoying problem that has stopped me installing ubuntu on my laptop for months now. Whenever I try and put the nvidia drivers on and X loads I just get a black screen and everything locks up... more info at: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=168459
can anyone PLEASE help me, I can even setup SSH if ya must ;D
before the enable command please run sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and make sure driver is set to nvidia and at first when it askes you to auto detect choose no
